item.title: Upcoming Events
item.description: SKEGNESS COACH TRIP ‘24 Sunday 12th May 2024 We are happy to announce the return of our popular Skegness coach trip! Departs: Leicester General Hospital @08:00 (Free Parking) Returns: Leaving Skegness @17:00 Tickets are available on a first-come, first-served basis at the bargain cost of just Â£15 per person. Renal patients will get refunded on the day. For bookings contact: Ann 07702 703 882 or Claire 07702 703 873
